description:
Introduction to Lashes is a dynamic and simple to follow crash course in lash application technique.  the focus of this course is on Stripe Lashes.

Danessa Myricks walks you through step-by-step how to;

Select your lash type, choose the right adhesive, apply lash pieces , strip lashes, corner lashes and bottom lashes.

You will also learn how to build and layer lashes for a quick day to night or on-set transition.

There are six unique video demonstrations in this course and tons of incredible lash tips.
title: Introduction to Lashes
